channel.title: Installations on Alisa Kobzar
channel.description: Recent content in Installations on Alisa Kobzar

item.title: private network
item.description: if the ecosystem of trees’ communication could be magnified, what would it sound like? which would be these trees’ own interpretations and how would the processing of the incoming information sound like? The installation explores the trees-network concept, as well as anthropogenic influences on the ecosystemic cycle. Live-electronics sound installation for 20 audio channels. Installation exists in 2 versions: using small loudspeakers (v.0) and using plexiglass (v.1). V.0 at IEM (KUG) Campus 2021

item.title: schallstrahl
item.description: Collaborative sound installation with Lino Leum @ the residency of artist Max Boehme in Waldhausen (Austria)

item.title: The ocean I am
item.description: „The ocean I am“ is a subjectively described collective consciousness, formed by the texts by Maria Kalesnikawa (Belorussian activist) and Vasyl Stus (Ukrainian poet), written in the prisons. These voices (partly unheard, interpreted by Viktoria Vitrenko) are ones of thousands wrongly convicted and sentenced people of todays regimes and ongoing war. performed at the Elevate festival (Graz) ver.1 for IKO and Audio Art festival (Krakow) ver.2 for 8 channels audio

item.title: Autonomous Systems_as if they were flowers
item.description: Collaborative cross-sectoral project autonomous systems, hosted at mur.at roles: sound and media art creator, interactive systems' creator, web-dev Mozilla Hubs space
